select
from t_capture_rank_job c where ( c.fExectionStatus='New' or (c.fExectionStatus='Complete' and c.fExectionType='Everyday' and c.fLastExecutionDate < curdate()) ) and c.fExectionTime <= curtime() AND c.fCaptureRankJobStatus = 1 order By c.fExectionTime limit 1;

select
from t_capture_rank_job c where c.fExectionStatus='Processing' AND c.fCaptureRankJobStatus = 1 order By c.fExectionTime limit 1;
select c.fCaptureRankJobStatus from t_capture_rank_job c where c.fUuid=#{captureRankJobUuid}
